name: smart-rental-system
description: Smart Rental System - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev:infra: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d postgres redis && docker compose -f docker-compose.translate.yml up -d
scripts.dev:infra:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.translate.yml down
scripts.dev:setup: npm run dev:infra && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: Smart Rental Team
